aboutSection.title: About
aboutSection.description: A seasoned graphic design professional with over five years of experience across sectors such as marketing, healthcare, finance, IT, interactive storytelling & telecommunications. His expertise extends beyond traditional graphic design to include a strong background in User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) design, making him versatile across both digital & print platforms.

experience.title: EXPERIENCE
experience.subtitle: HISTORY
experience.description: With a proven track record of over five years in graphic and UI/UX design, Mezher Jeebat has led innovative projects across diverse industries, from telecommunications and media to healthcare and interactive storytelling. Known for his leadership and creative vision, he consistently drives teams to excel, achieving top rankings in brand implementation and crafting intuitive, user-centered designs that resonate deeply with audiences.

sections.title: Work Process
sections.description: We started with very little; we based our work on assumptions based on our knowledge, internal interview of blockchain explorer and attentive analysis of our competitions.One important question was how simple did we want the Explorer to be? Would it make sense for it to be simple even, like blockchain.com ? Or did we want to.

sections.title: Outcomes
sections.description: This endeavor helped us test our work process under heavy strain and very little requirement, pushing for better work collaboration within engineering teams on complex products. BitMEX Brand Our new brand helped us revive our brand and stand out from the crowded crypto industry and leverage our existing heritage, while paving the way for our planned.
